DOC.brief_summary: This is a prospective randomized study evaluating dosing frequency of gonadotropin administration in ART cycles.
DOC.brief_title: Once Daily vs Twice Daily Administration of Gonadotropins in Assisted Reproductive Technologies (ART)
DOC.detailed_description: Using once daily or bid dosing of gonadotropins in ART has been arbitrary with no studies showing whether splitting the medication dose improves ART parameters. This study was undertaken to provide an answer to this important question.
DOC.criteria: women < 40 undergoing ART women > 40 endometriomas severe cervical stenosis testicular sperm
